programme.desc: Best and Bester turn into chess pieces in 'Chess-a-pult', then in 'Smart & Smarter', Bester and Best are tasked with neutralising enemy ransomware for the Bettervale Investigation Bureau. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Science Scouts raise money for a trip to Mars in 'Biscuit Ballyhoo', then in 'Student Driver Survivor', a new driving school opens in town. (S15, ep 4)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward takes a new job as Manager of Weenie Hut Jr's in 'Wiener Takes All', then in 'Stuck in an Elevator', Squidward gets trapped on his way to return a nearly overdue library book. (S15, ep 5)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The girls are remembering their home in 'The Tree House', then in 'Saving Simon', Alvin and Theodore think that Simon is going away to a boarding school, and try to keep him at home. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dave discovers he didn't graduate from high school and ends up in class with Alvin in 'Back to School', then in 'Bromance', Simon has found a new best friend, but then gets ditched. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in 'Handemonium', then in 'Breakin', SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Vanzilla seems too broken down to ever drive again in 'Leave No Van Behind', then in 'Sponsor Tripped', Lynn and friends enjoy free perks around Royal Woods when their team gets sponsored. (S7, ep 11)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Lost and Founders Day: Dev's dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids' wants, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wanda's wish granting. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Z's All That: Phoebe & Max get to act as a superhero mentor to one of their siblings, but quickly regret selecting Nora after seeing Billy's surprisingly impressive skillset. (S4, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Time Fighters - Part 2: When Drex prevents Young Ray from ever being densitized in the past, Henry and a now destructible Ray must take on Drex and restore Ray's indestructibility. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Temporary Mom: When the boys get stuck with Miss Miller as a babysitter, they each take a crack at finding a replacement.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Tee Fore Two: Alvin volunteers to caddy a charity golf tournament and surprisingly gets paired up with Miss Smith.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: It Came From Outer Space: Alvin passes off a rock he found on the ground as a meteor for a science project and gets some unwanted attention.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Girls Night Out: Dave discovers he's not too good at roughing it outdoors when he goes on a day hike with the Chipettes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton teams up with Man Ray to take over the Krusty Krab and the world in 'Super Evil Aquatic Villain Team Up Is Go!', and in 'Chum Fricassee', Squidward quits the Krusty Krab to work for Plankton!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick go on an advertising blitz in 'The Good Krabby Name', and in 'Move It or Lose It', Mr. Krabs and Plankton issue petitions to get their rival's restaurant bulldozed.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln's is signed up for peewee football in 'The Loudest Yard', and in 'Raw Deal', when Lucy reads Lincoln's fortune saying his day will end in disaster, Lincoln becomes a hypochondriac. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has four dates to the dance in 'Dance Dance Resolution', then in 'A Fair to Remember', Lori tries to make Bobby jealous by hanging with Clyde when Lincoln and Bobby become friends. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin helps the mathletes stand up to the school bullies in 'Members Only', then in 'The New Kid', Alvin befriends a lonely new kidl, but the new student may not be who he says he is. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin makes fun of Simon's magic act, Simon challenges him to a magic duel in 'Simon the Superb', then in 'The Sub', Alvin reluctantly signs up to teach the after school music class. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Doppel-Gamers: Billy and Nora bond with an outgoing pair of teens at a gamer's convention, making Max and Phoebe aware of much they have been neglecting their younger siblings. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Floral Support: Max uses Phoebe to help retrieve his chronicle of evil deeds from the school's confiscation closet, but goes too far in breaking her trust to pull off his plan. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Opposite Universe: Henry and Charlotte are transported into an opposite universe where Ray and Schwoz are evil and want to destroy Piper. They must figure out how to get back. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Twin Henrys: Henry has Schwoz's shape-shifting android fill in for him at a family dinner so he can watch the MMA fight of the year with Charlotte and Ray. (S2, ep 16)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star's pet has puppies in '10 and 1 Toilets', and then in 'Family Plotz', the Star family spends a day at the cemetery. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: The kids visit the White House in 'Bringing Down The House', then in 'Mountain Hard Pass', an intense day of hiking in the Rocky Mountains sees the kids try to find reasons to stop the hike. (S7 ep 6)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel goes to court for Cosmo and Wanda in 'Cookie's Court', then in 'Work Her Magic', Hazel wishes to be her mom's assistant. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob And The Big Wave: Our heroes find themselves stranded on a tropical island, inhabited by an enigmatic surfing guru named Jack Kahuna Laguna. Guest starring the voice of Johnny Depp.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Thundermans Banished! - Part 1: After their superhero secret is exposed, the family is relocated to a new city. But Phoebe & Max must risk everything to save Hiddenville. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Pong Plant: Taylor and her friends must find a way to protect a very rare, very smelly plant, from the clutches of an evil tech billionaire who wants to harvest it as an energy source. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: Jinxed
programme.desc: Ciara Bravo stars as Meg Murphy, a girl who sets out to break an old curse on her family to get the normal life she's dreamed of. But for the Murphys, if something can go wrong, it will.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Never Friending Story: Phoebe and Max worry that they will be stuck hanging out together all the time when their friends start to spend time with each other. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Attack of The Clones: When Danger Force leaves for an out-of-town mission, Ray calls on the Danger Force Clones for help. He quickly realizes that the clones are very, very different. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Diddly Bops: Sikowitz recruits the gang to form a children's band for a party. When a leaked video of the group becomes popular, Andre finds it hard to be taken seriously. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Smells Like Tween Spirit: When Julie gets scouted for the field hockey team, the girls realize that being an athlete is a surefire ticket to popularity, but Julie is the opposite of a jock. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Indestructible Henry - Part 1: When Kid Danger is almost badly injured on a mission, Henry decides to go through the Densitizer and become indestructible like Captain Man. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Indestructible Henry - Part 2: Henry decides to go through the Densitizer and become indestructible like Captain Man. But things don't turn out quite the way he hopes. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Smells Like Team Spirit: Phoebe and Max must work together on series of superhero team building exercises, but their different approaches put their future as a team at risk. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Max to the Future: Worried that he isn't considered a valuable superhero, Max creates a machine that can predict crimes, but spins a web of lies to keep the truth from Phoebe. (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: A Film By Dale Squires: When a hot young filmmaker comes to Hollywood Arts, the kids are excited to work on his project. But when the film is released, the kids want revenge. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Diddly Bops: Sikowitz recruits the gang to form a children's band for a party. When a leaked video of the group becomes popular, Andre finds it hard to be taken seriously. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dude Where's Macaw: While trying to defend his elite gamer status, Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Lemmings!: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Flower Power: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzy's adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Teleportation's the Way to Go!: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American Indian chest. If he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other! (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Countdown: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Airlines: Grizzy is disturbed in the middle of his snack by a strange flow of objects that have been transformed into hot air balloons. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Relax Bear: Grizzy discovers with that the ranger has purchased a new recliner. But even an armchair designed for relaxation can be used for other purposes by the Lemmings! (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Gliding: The Lemmings kite surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite to win she-bear's affection. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Sound of a Lemming: Grizzy snatches the last jar of chocolate spread out from under the noses of the Lemmings. In exchange, he offers them the toy stuck inside the lid: a mini-flute. (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear in the Wind: The Lemmings play a new game but interrupt Grizzy watching his favourite TV show. (S1 Ep39)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Construction Bear: Grizzy decides to build a building to impress she-bear. (S1 Ep40)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Kung Fu Lemmings: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on. (S1 Ep41)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Midsummer Bear's Dream: Grizzy dreams that he's a valiant knight but is woken up by the Lemmings blasting music. Grizzy has only one desire: pick up his dream where he left off. (S1 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble: When rain derails an outside game of catch, someone suggests they play inside. This prompts Izzy to lead the group through her wildly imaginative worst case scenario. (S3 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dingo Ate My Duncan: When all their classmates are replaced with well behaved Australian doppelgangers in a school exchange program, Lightning and Cody start getting suspicious. (S3 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Erase Your Head: Gwen orders a personality modifying ray to tone her perky parents, but decides to test it on the class first. (S3 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: CodE.T.: When Cody gets sick, the kids want to send a message back to his home planet in the hope that they can save him, but Courtney is not in favour of the plan. (S3 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Quiche it Goodbye: When an 'evil conglomerate' is threatening to take over Chef's favourite childhood restaurant, Owen rallies the kids to take them down. (S3 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gwen Scary, Gwen Lost - Part 2: Gwen's plan turns out far spookier than Chef ever hoped. (S3 Ep28)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Trousering Inferno: The Bad Guy Busters must reunite to save Izzy after Harold uncovers her previous identity and leads a super villain from her past right to her. (S3 Ep29)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bearly Edible: After eating snacks meant for everyone and replacing them with disgusting low budget cookies from Barfvomita, Owen is full of guilt and tries to make things right. (S3 Ep32)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Art of Illusion: During a training, Corto meets Gavinda Teach, leader of the Mirages and Whale's rival. Teach uses that time to lure Corto into using her technology... (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: New: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Monkey Mind: Xinyan has a plot to get all humans out of his way in one fell swoop. In a double double-cross, the monkey pits Jade and Crimson against each other. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: New: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Thread: On Blue Lynx's maiden heist, she takes a souvenir - unaware of a Shard in it. With the power to bind those who wear it, L.J. and Pearl wind up unlikely "besties." (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Robostus: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Robostus, an akumatized robot. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Guiltrip: When Reflekta locks herself into a bottomless abyss of guilt, Ladybug calls on an ally with unfailing optimism. (S4 Ep11)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Us 'r' Toys: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Blonde Fist
programme.desc: 1991. Drama. Director: Frank Clarke. Stars Margi Clarke, Carroll Baker & Ken Hutchison. Ronnie flees domestic life to find her father in New York and ends up boxing to make ends meet. [S]

programme.title: Men In War
programme.desc: 1957. War. Director: Anthony Mann. Stars Robert Ryan, Robert Keith, Aldo Ray & Vic Morrow. During the Korean War, Lt. Benson and his troops find a colonel experiencing psychological combat trauma. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Singing Violin. 1954. Stars Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Betty is being tormented by apparent hallucinations, so her fiancé calls Sherlock and Dr Watson. [S]

programme.title: No Lady
programme.desc: 1931. Hen-pecked Mr. Pog (Lupino Lane) takes his wife and children to Blackpool but is mistaken for an international criminal. [S]

programme.title: The Girl In the Picture (1957)
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed by Don Chaffey. Starring Donald Houston, Patrick Holt and Junia Crawford. George Keefe's policeman brother was murdered four years ago and the killer is still on the loose. [S]

programme.title: The Butler's Dilemma
programme.desc: 1943. Comedy. Directed by Leslie S. Hiscott. Stars Richard Hearne, Ronald Shiner & Hermione Gingold. In debt to gamblers, Rodney (Richard Hearne) agrees to pass as a butler at a gambling party. [S]

programme.title: The Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Anatole Litvak. Stars Vivien Leigh, Kenneth More & Eric Portman. A woman, unhappy in her marriage, has an affair with an RAF pilot, but will he be more than she can handle? [S]

programme.title: The Punching Preacher
programme.desc: An insightful documentary by Peter Williams about George Foreman, a man of great faith who was known as one of the best fighters who ever lived, who twice held the World Heavyweight title. [S]

programme.title: The Shillingbury Blowers
programme.desc: 1979. Drama. Directed by Val Guest and stars Robin Nedwell, Diane Keen and Trevor Howard. The arrival of a pop star and his wife, upsets the status quo of the Shillingbury village brass band. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Settling a Score - Part 1. 1973. Stars Frank Middlemass, Andy Bradford & Geoffrey Hinsliff. Footballer Johnny Bates is accused of assault and occasioning actual bodily harm to striker Arnie. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Settling a Score - Part 2. 1973. Stars John Flanagan, Stephen Whittaker & Fred Feast. Kevin Lewis is accused of injuring teammate Arnie. Meanwhile, Chairman James Harris says Bates apologised. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Settling a Score - Part 3. 1973. Stars Leon Vitali, Colin Rix, James Copeland. The Porthampton City manager gives evidence for Johnny Bates and a journalist reveals the threats made against Arnie. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout June. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life By Bread Alone
programme.desc: 1964. A look at all of the fascinating aspects about baking and how women influence what bread is made of.

programme.title: The Brothers

programme.title: The Blue Lagoon

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Gerd Oswald. Stars Robert Wagner, Jeffrey Hunter & Virginia Leith. A college boy obsessed with wealth will stop at nothing to gain the inheritance of a young heiress. [S]

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Gerd Oswald. Stars Robert Wagner, Jeffrey Hunter & Virginia Leith. A college boy obsessed with wealth will stop at nothing to gain the inheritance of a young heiress. [S]

programme.desc: 1936. Comedy. Businessman Julian (Henry Kendall) invents an important but imaginary partner to stave off his creditors. Stars Alastair Sim. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: A spectacular performance of Up On The Roof in this wonderful musical video from the 60s.

programme.title: The Red House

programme.title: They Came to a City
programme.desc: 1944. Fantasy. Directed by Basil Dearden. Stars John Clements, Googie Withers & Raymond Huntley. Nine people from different walks of life find themselves transported to a mysterious city. [S]

programme.title: A Lifetime Ago with The Baim Collection
programme.desc: Transport Command. 1961. A gripping film about the men of Britain's Transport Command, a division of the Royal Air Force, travelling to the Middle East.

programme.title: Unearthly Stranger

programme.title: The Kidnappers

programme.title: Ladies Who Do

programme.title: It Always Rains On Sunday
programme.desc: 1947. Drama. Director: Robert Hamer. Stars Googie Withers, John McCallum, Jack Warner & Susan Shaw. Rose wants to escape the drudgery of her daily life when an old lover escapes from prison. [S]

programme.title: You Rang, M'Lord?
programme.desc: Lady Lavender's money goes astray and she calls in the police. Will her money turn up at the bishop's auction inside one of the Meldrum vases? S2 E4 The Meldrum Vases

programme.title: Likely Lads: Whatever Happened?
programme.desc: Terry tries to track down some of his old flames, but probing into the past produces embarrassing results. S1 E5: I'll Never Forget Whatshername

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: There's trouble on the buses as a strike hits the depot, new rotas mean Stan's on an earlier shift, and misses the canteen's lunch opening entirely. S1 E1: The Early Shift

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Simon and Oliver look in danger of losing much more than their hearts when they both take a fancy to a beautiful shop assistant. S5 E1: In Whom We Tryst

programme.title: London's East End Before the War
programme.desc: We explore London's East End in the years before the Second World War - a world of cobbled streets and thick fog where thousands of Londoners live in cramped, sooty lice-infected tenements.

programme.title: London's East End in WWII
programme.desc: The East End is rocked by the Luftwaffe in 1940 as whole areas are reduced to rubble; it emerges victorious into a new world, but the Docks are closed and the old East End will vanish within 30 years.

programme.title: The Secret World of Richard Nixon
programme.desc: This episode reveals Nixon's conspiracy to sabotage the 1968 peace talks with Vietnam in order to extend the war and allow a Nixon election victory later that same year. Ep2

programme.title: Messerschmitt at War
programme.desc: The Messerschmitt Bf 109 was matched only by the Spitfire - it was the Luftwaffe's only single-seat fighter for the first few years of WWII and the RAF's nemesis during the Battle of Britain.

programme.title: That's 60s - Best Music Live!
programme.desc: A selection of live performances from TV music shows in the 1960s for a genuine taste of the best of the '60s!

programme.title: Steptoe and Son
programme.desc: Albert has done his back in and runs Harold ragged with demands for help; after a bit of detective work, Harold deduces all is not quite as it seems. S8 E5: Upstairs, Downstairs, Upstairs, Downstairs
